mapper.insert: insert into bora_book_detail(id, bk_num, bk_day, bk_iow, bk_group, bk_category, bk_money, bk_memo) values (#{id}, #{bk_num}, #{bk_day}, #{bk_iow}, #{bk_group}, #{bk_category}, #{bk_money}, #{bk_memo});
mapper.select: select b.bk_num, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, b.bk_budget, d.bk_detail_num, b.id, d.bk_day, d.bk_iow, d.bk_group, d.bk_category, d.bk_money, d.bk_memo from bora_book_detail d join bora_book b on b.bk_num = d.bk_num where b.id=#{loginID} and b.bk_year=#{year} and b.bk_month=#{month} order by d.bk_day desc limit 0, 10
select b.bk_num, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, b.bk_budget, d.bk_detail_num, b.id, d.bk_day, d.bk_iow, d.bk_group, d.bk_category, d.bk_money, d.bk_memo from bora_book_detail d join bora_book b

select b.bk_num, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, b.bk_budget, d.bk_detail_num, b.id, d.bk_day, d.bk_iow, d.bk_group, d.bk_category, d.bk_money, d.bk_memo from bora_book_detail d join bora_book b on b.bk_num = d.bk_num where b.id=#{loginID} limit #{pm.startRow}, #{pm.vo.perPageNum}

select b.bk_num, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, b.bk_budget, d.bk_detail_num, b.id, d.bk_day, d.bk_iow, d.bk_group, d.bk_category, d.bk_money, d.bk_memo from bora_book_detail d join bora_book b on b.bk_num = d.bk_num where b.id=#{loginID} and b.bk_year=#{bk_year} and b.bk_month=#{bk_month} limit #{pm.startRow}, #{pm.vo.perPageNum}
select count(*) from bora_book_detail where id=#{loginID}

select b.bk_num, b.bk_year, b.bk_month, d.bk_detail_num, d.id, d.bk_day, d.bk_iow, d.bk_group, d.bk_category, d.bk_money, d.bk_memo from bora_book_detail d join bora_book b on b.bk_num = d.bk_num where b.id=#{loginID} and d.bk_detail_num=#{bk_detail_num}
